Plot: A ticket-collecting romantic pretends to be engaged to an unconscious man but can't fool his brother.
Title: While You Were Sleeping
Actors: Sandra Bullock, Bill Pullman, Peter Gallagher, Peter Boyle
tomatoConsensus: While You Were Sleeping is built wholly from familiar ingredients, but assembled with such skill -- and with such a charming performance from Sandra Bullock -- that it gives formula a good name.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
